Please select a reason for leaving.

-If you're the ledger host, ownership will
automatically transfer to a member and you'll leave the ledger.

-If you're a member, you'll immediately leave the ledger.

-All users will have all ledgers,
data, and personal information deleted immediately upon withdrawal. 

Do you still want to delete your account?
Thank you for using Floney.\nYou\'re always welcome back!

Hello!
Shared ledger Floney has launched.
If you have any questions or concerns while using it,
please feel free to contact us via email and we'll be happy to help.

Thank you for your support and interest.
Thank you.

When the owner subscribes, everyone can use\nall premium features without limits.
You\'ve exceeded the number of ledgers you can join.\nCheck your ledgers in My Page.
You\'re not a member of this ledger.\nPlease check again.

Delete the ledger team? All entries will be deleted and cannot be restored.
-If you're the ledger owner, ownership will be transferred automatically.
-If you're a member, you'll be removed immediately.
-All ledgers, data, and personal info will be permanently deleted.

Still want to continue?
Change the currency to %1$s?\nChanging this will reset the ledger.
You can\'t delete your account while your subscription is active.\nCheck your subscription details in My Page.
Delete "%1$s"?\nAll entries using this category will be deleted.
Delete this recurring entry?\nAll entries in this series will be deleted.
An update is required for smooth app usage.
Floney has been improved for better service!\nWould you like to update?
Please check your email or password again.
Payment connection failed. Please try again.
You can add up to 4 photos.
Can\'t find your currency?\nTell Floney about your preferred currency.
Change currency to %1$s?\nLedger will be reset when changed.
All entries will be deleted when resetting.\nDo you want to proceed?
Delete %1$s\'s ledger?\nAll entries will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
All members must leave before deleting the ledger.
All your entries will be deleted when you leave.\nDo you want to proceed?
Enter your current assets.\nFloney will show you the future asset flow.

Carryover settings carry the amount left after subtracting
expenses from income recorded last month.

Negative amounts are recorded as expenses
and positive amounts are recorded as income.
You can add or delete categories\nused when recording entries
Delete \'%1$s\' category?\nAll entries with this category will be deleted.
Delete this recurring entry?\nAll entries with this recurrence will be deleted.
%1$s days have passed\nsince the last settlement

Your changes have not been saved.\nDo you want to leave anyway?
Enjoy more convenient features\nwith Floney Plus+
Remove ads and invite more members!\nEnjoy various benefits with Floney.

- Benefits are applied immediately upon subscription.\n- You can cancel anytime up to 24 hours before your current plan ends.\n- If not cancelled 24 hours before expiry, subscription will auto-renew and charges will apply.
- Please note that deleting the app does not cancel the in-app subscription. Restore Purchase
- For cancellation and refund details, please check the Terms of Service. Terms of Service
Auto-renewal will stop from the next billing date, and you won‚Äôt be able to use subscription benefits afterward.
Do you want to cancel your subscription?
If you want to resubscribe,\ngo to [My Page] > [View Subscription Details]\nto start again.
Enjoy more convenient features with Floney.\nYou can check your status in [My Page] > [View Subscription Details].
When the owner subscribes to Floney Plus+,\neveryone can use various features without limits.
You cannot delete your account without cancelling your subscription.\nPlease check your subscription status in My Page.
